General.Name: Zinus Inc
General.Description: Zinus, Inc manufactures and sells mattresses, bedroom furniture, beds, bedding products, etc. It sells it products through stores and online channels. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Bundang Amigo Tower, Seongnam-si, South Korea
